external_references.description: Lenart Bermejo, Sunny Lu, Ted Lee. (2024, September 9). Earth Preta Evolves its Attacks with New Malware and Strategies. Retrieved August 4, 2025.

objects.description: [PUBLOAD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1228) has identified internet connectivity details through commands such as `tracert -h 5 -4 google.com` and `curl http://myip.ipip.net`.(Citation: Trend Micro MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD HIUPAN SEPTEMBER 2024)
